attributes.action: British government to evacuate British nationals out of Israel
attributes.additional_details: Canada, US, Thai, Serbian governments have started doing evacuating its citizens days ago - why is the British government silent? Why is it WizzAir collecting data on whether you have made it out of the country (after they cancelled their flights) but the FCDO only asking you to register if you’re there (it does not even ask you if you’re with any family members - just whether you’re there with your husband/ wife and children).
attributes.background: British government must get its citizens out of Israel

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has facilitated flights for British nationals leaving Israel and Gaza. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-government-continues-to-facilitate-british-nationals-leaving-israel-and-gaza
